pageContext.claim: “Our ICE officers arrested more than 127,000 criminal aliens. Can you imagine? These are criminal aliens... Including those charged or convicted are 48,000 assaults, 12,000 sex crimes, and 1,800 homicides. You know, you don't hear that.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump jumbles together some correct statistics but leaves a misleading impression. Out 143,470 administrative arrests, nearly 128,000 undocumented immigrants had criminal convictions or pending criminal charges. But the most common convictions and charges were for immigration, drugs, and traffic offenses, including DUI.
